name: Yuukyuu Kumikyoku: All Star Project
overview: Yukyu Kumikyoku is the latest game in the Yukyu Gensokyoku games series for the PSOne console. This time that game is a mix between an adventure game and board game and features a special mode in which the player can see the character artworks, games music and other unlockable features. The game plot's is about that 28 students are selected to a special test and taken to a private university: There they have to pass some tests and be the first one in reaching the goal in different virtual spaces (the board game parts of the game). The main goal of the game in to be promoted until be the final chosen one. The game features other events like: school trips, valantine's day, sports festival, other festivals, etc. The game features different characters for the player to choose one and provide him with a name. During the game the player have to walk around the city and talk to different characters to trade items and advance through the day. In some days there are some kind of competition between some of the characters that takes place in a board game in which the player can use his items when he encounters another character in the same square of the board, depending of the choices he will win and advance in the board, making the other character to go back a square. The adventure part uses 2 perspectives: a first person perspective for some conversations and a third person perspective when walking around the city and trade the items.
